attributes.action: Create an amnesty on credit scoring through credit referencing agencies for the next 2 years, followed by a fairer system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Create an
Amnesty on Credit Scoring through credit referencing agencies
for the minimum of the next 2 years, followed by a fairer system.

To prevent further widespread financial damage to victims of
the recession (loss of business, redundancy or illness (long-term) I hereby request an
amnesty be placed to prevent undue wrongful scoring on peoples
records that will only serve to line the pockets of the
financial institutions that have caused the problem in the
first place. 
This is a time bomb waiting to happen. 
These financial institutions will be rubbing their hands in glee at the 
extra high interest rates they will be able to charge to people on their next
mortgage etc.
This action will result in further loss of
business as peoples income will not be spent on goods but 
back to these institutions and so the decline will continue.
New legislation is needed to create a fairer system
which can be through a legal proving system.

Thank you for supporting this cause and preventing further financial damage.
